snippet: Lawyers within the Treasury Department have recommended a preliminary settlement with Standard Chartered, clearing the path for the British bank to pay a penalty to state and federal prosecutors and move beyond claims that it flouted laws governing...
abstract: Lawyers within the Treasury Department have recommended a preliminary settlement with Standard Chartered, clearing the path for the British bank to pay a penalty to state and federal prosecutors and move beyond claims that it flouted laws governing international money transfers.

headline.main: Treasury Backs Plan for Standard Chartered Settlement
